references.reason: This paper is foundational to the use of Gaussian Processes in machine learning, which is the core methodology used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Bayesian optimization with safety constraints: safe and automatic parameter tuning in robotics
references.reason: This paper introduces SAFEOPT, which is the algorithm extended by this paper to handle time-varying settings.

references.paper_title: Safe exploration for optimization with Gaussian processes
references.reason: This paper is foundational for safe Bayesian optimization, which is the basis of the proposed algorithm.

references.paper_title: Gaussian process optimization in the bandit setting: No regret and experimental design
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical foundations for Gaussian process optimization in the bandit setting, which is the context for this work.
This paper extends Gaussian process bandit optimization to contextual settings, which is relevant to the time-varying setting considered in this paper.
